'''0.24_SURVIVAL_TEST_02''' is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on September 1, 2009, at 17:34 UTC to try again to fix a crash bug.<ref name="fix">[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P12:01:17 <PuyoDead> oh great, it crashed already''" [...] "''P12:32:47 <08Notch> PuyoDead: I'm trying one last thing now''" [...] "''P12:34:59 <08Notch> PuyoDead: Could you try again?''" [...] "''P12:35:09 <08Notch> _02 fixes a potential maybe-problem''" [...] "''P12:36:16 <PuyoDead> Notch: nope, same thing again''" (17:01 to 17:36 UTC)</ref> This fix once again failed.

0.24_SURVIVAL_TEST_02 was reuploaded<ref>The original 0.24_SURVIVAL_TEST_02 was uploaded at 17:34 UTC, and the <samp>.jar</samp> for 0.24_SURVIVAL_TEST_03 dates to 19:55 UTC+2 (17:55 UTC), therefore 0.24_SURVIVAL_TEST_02 was reuploaded.</ref> at 17:42 UTC (8 minutes after release) to finally fix the crash bug.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P12:40:26 <08Notch> PuyoDead: got time for one really-this-time-last test?''" [...] "''P12:42:19 <08Notch> PuyoDead: Try now''" [...] "''P12:43:55 <PuyoDead> super-duper slow, but it worked''" (17:40 to 17:43 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Tried again to fix a crash bug; the fix was once again unsuccessful.<ref name="fix"/>
** But in the reupload, it has finally been fixed.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P12:40:26 <08Notch> PuyoDead: got time for one really-this-time-last test?''" [...] "''P12:42:19 <08Notch> PuyoDead: Try now''" [...] "''P12:43:55 <PuyoDead> super-duper slow, but it worked''" (17:40 to 17:43 UTC)</ref>
* Fixed block cracks appearing on only one side of the block.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P12:37:08 <Sharkz> blocks are working again?'' [...] ''P12:37:35 <Evilgrim> Yay! Its test 2! Cracks everywhere. :D''"</ref>
